story_final_02_10000/2401_1201_0200_10:
Hmph. I figured as much. This mission is a failure.
Time to retreat.
story_final_02_10000/2401_1201_0400_10:
Apparently, once Hoopa regained its senses, the
Legendary Pokémon it had summoned all
disappeared.
story_final_02_10000/2401_1201_0500_10:
We’ve managed to capture a few Ultra Beasts,
but that’s not enough to overcome the sync pairs
of Pasio on top of the other organizations.
story_final_02_10000/2401_1201_0600_10:
Perhaps I could take you down here if we
continued battling, but that would be pointless.
story_final_02_10000/2401_1201_0700_10:
Hmph. What a poor example I’m setting for my
subordinates. How will I face them now?
story_final_02_10000/2401_1201_0800_10: You’re not the type to give up like that.
story_final_02_10000/2401_1201_0900_10:
You say that, but you probably have your next
plan in mind already...
story_final_02_10000/2401_1201_1200_10:
This operation did prove useful to me in the end.
There will be other opportunities.
story_final_02_10000/2401_1201_1300_10: I can’t give up on taking over Pasio just yet.
story_final_02_10000/2401_1201_1400_10: Then I won’t give up, either.
story_final_02_10000/2401_1201_1500_10: On destroying all evil in the world?
story_final_02_10000/2401_1201_1700_10: There’s evil in everyone’s heart, to some degree.
story_final_02_10000/2401_1201_1900_10: That’s why it’s not possible to destroy all of it.
story_final_02_10000/2401_1201_2000_10:
There are as many types of evil in this world as
there are people. I’ll figure out how to deal
with that.
story_final_02_10000/2401_1201_2100_10:
If force isn’t gonna work, I’ll combat evil with
another kind of power—one that comes from
the heart.
story_final_02_10000/2401_1201_2200_10:
That’s what true strength is, and that’s how I’ll
protect the things that are important to me.
story_final_02_10000/2401_1201_2300_10: Even if I can only stop it now with force...
story_final_02_10000/2401_1201_2400_10: One day, I’ll conquer all evil—with my heart!
story_final_02_10000/2401_1201_2700_10: How much strength will you obtain, I wonder.
story_final_02_10000/2401_1201_2800_10:
I suppose that’s something I should look
forward to.
